onboarding.step1_desc: Let's get you set up to achieve your goals. This app helps you break down your ambitions into manageable tasks.
onboarding.step2_desc: Use the dashboard to see your daily tasks, monitor your weekly and monthly goals, and build your momentum.
onboarding.step3_desc: Each week, reflect on your progress. Our AI will provide personalized suggestions to keep you on track.

dashboard.addTaskPlaceholder: Add a new task or use the mic...
dashboard.noTasks: No tasks for today. Add one to get started!
dashboard.createGoalDesc: What new ambition do you want to conquer? The AI will create an inspirational image for it.
dashboard.noGoals: No goals yet. Add one to get started!
dashboard.momentumDesc: Keep it up to build a strong habit!

progress.title: Your Progress
progress.description: Visualize your accomplishments and growth over time.
progress.xpDesc: Complete tasks to earn XP and level up!
progress.chartsDesc: Your performance over different time periods.
progress.heatmapDesc: Your daily task completion over the last few months.

review.title: Weekly Reflective Review
review.description: Take a moment to reflect on your past week and set your intentions for the next one.
review.reflectionLabel: My reflection on last week's progress, challenges, and wins:
review.reflectionPlaceholder: e.g., I was consistent with my workouts but struggled to find time for reading...

settings.appearanceDesc: Customize the look and feel of the app.
settings.dailyRemindersDesc: Get a push notification in the evening for incomplete tasks.
settings.weeklyReviewRemindersDesc: Get a reminder at the end of each week.
settings.notificationsBlockedDesc: You have blocked notifications. To enable reminders, please update your browser settings.
settings.resetDataDesc: This will reset all tasks and goals to their initial state.
settings.resetConfirmationDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your tasks and goals data from this device.
settings.achievementsDesc: You've unlocked {unlockedCount} of {totalCount} badges. Keep up the great work!

micNotAllowed.title: Speech Recognition Error
micNotAllowed.desc: Microphone access denied. Please allow it in your browser settings.

micNotSupported.title: Browser Not Supported
micNotSupported.desc: Speech recognition is not available in your browser.

micStartError.title: Could not start recording
micStartError.desc: Please check your microphone permissions and try again.

goalTitleRequired.title: Goal Title Required
goalTitleRequired.desc: Please enter a title for your goal.

goalImageError.title: AI Image Error
goalImageError.desc: Could not generate an image for your goal. Please try again.

notificationPermissionDenied.title: Permission Denied
notificationPermissionDenied.desc: You have blocked notifications. Please enable them in your browser settings to receive reminders.
